title: What isAWS IAM?

metadata.description: Learn about What isAWS IAM? with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
AWS IAM is short for: Amazon Identity and Access Management.
AWS IAM manages access to AWS services and resources.
AWS IAM Introduction Video
.com is collaborating with Amazon Web Services to deliver digital training content to our students
What is AWS IAM?
Amazon IAM provides management of access to AWS services with fine grained control. Individual users and groups can be created and their persmissions are described in policies (JSON documents). IAM roles can have defined permissions and be assigned to users, applications and services.
Amazon IAM Pricing
Amazon IAM is provided free for AWS services.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers What isAWS IAM? concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use What isAWS IAM? effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of What isAWS IAM? and how to apply it in your projects.
